name: Faiths End - 2D Survival Horror
description:
COMING 2020

When Matilda Stockwood's partner is abducted her only hope is to follow the trail back to her childhood home, but the once idyllic town of Raven's Point isn't exactly how she remembers.

Features:


  • The Story: Immerse yourself in a gripping dark and twisted story; as thrilling as it is horrifying.
  • The Game: Solve puzzles and piece together the evidence in your search for Eden.
  • Survive: Unspeakable horror lurks round every corner, Run and hide when you can... Fight when you must
  • Listen: Chilling sound design including a haunting original score
